name: BBM Ladies Junior Fit Tees
description:
New for summer of 2013. These extra comfy ladies T's have Brother Believe Me design work on both the front & back. 
Lively heathered, antiqued, and solid colors available across a broad color palette...more color option photos available to view at http://brotherbelieveme.com/#d10/flickr , choose merchandise from the pull down menu.
*Color/Sizing options available. Prior to purchase, please email your desired size to brotherbelievemerocks@gmail.com and we will reply with the color choices in that size.
***SHIPPING INCLUDED***

name: BBM Mens Tees
description:
NEW FOR 2013!!! Real men wear black...and that is the only color option you get with this new comfortable but durable T-shirt design which carries artwork on both the front and the back. Available in special order sizes larger than 2XL for an additional $5.00 (please allow extra delivery time for special orders)
***SHIPPING INCLUDED***

name: BBM "Party Rocker" Sticker
description:
Enjoy the stylistic swagger of the unofficial BBM mascot, "Rooster McSatisfied" as he appears on this 5" round sticker that is the exact finish as Brian's drums that he plays live.
*SHIPPING INCLUDED*

name: BBM Collapsible Can Koozies
description:
This bright collapsible can koozie is hard to lose, but can be easily tucked in your pocket or purse. The current "Rock Up Front, Party in the Rear" design is nearly sold out!!! Get yours while you still can!
***SHIPPING INCLUDED***

name: BBM Signed 8x10
description:
A true 1 of a kind...Members of Brother Believe Me will sign and doodle on your 8x10 glossy print until you have a masterpiece that will never be exactly replicated. Be sure to check the "with extra doodling" option for an even more original print for only 1 penny more.
   Feel free to frame and display this work of art in your favorite space. They look great in offices, kitchens, bathrooms and any other place where a little extra awesomeness is required.
***Please take a photo of where you decide to display and share it on our facebook at https://www.facebook.com/pages/Brother-Believe-Me/126884966803
***SHIPPING INCLUDED***
